title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: The height of the label does not change immediately when the font size is modified. This can cause the label to display incorrectly.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label to the application.
2. Edit the font size of the label to 18 points.
OB: The label's height remains the same even after modifying the font size.
EB: The label's height should adjust accordingly when the font size is modified.
SR:
1. Create a new label or select an existing one.
2. Modify the font size of the label to 18 points.
3. Observe that the label's height does not change to match the new font size.
